Summary: watched circular ufo follow car then take sharp right and left
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my room at about 10PM and had to go to the bathroom, we have a window in our bathroom thats glass but you cant see through it (all you see is reflected light) and the entire window was just orange, which was weird because it was night time, I look out my bedroom window and see a circular ufo, about 50ft in diameter, about 10 blinking white lights around it and one red light in teh middle that would flash randomly and REALLY fast. It was in a subdivision about 100 yards from my house, flying above the road and following a car that was driving out of the subdivison. I ran outside and the UFO took a sudden and sharp right turn and flew off in the distance, but instead of just gradually getting smaller and smaller until it wasn't noticable, the UFO just disappeared after about 20 seconds of flying in the distance.
